question: Which of the following is wrongly matched?
explanation: Baburnama is an autobiographical book written by Zahir-ud-din Muhammad Babur. He had vanquished Ibrahim Lodhi in the First Battle of Panipat in 1526. In the reign of Abu\'l Fath Jalal ud-din Muhammad Akbar, Baburnama was translated into Persian by Akbar\'s courtier, Abdur Rahim.
